As you approach an intersection, you see there is a person entering the crosswalk. You must stop:

driver_test_questions.option_a: A.the train is at least 100 ft. away.
driver_test_questions.question: While waiting at a railway crossing with flashing lights, you are permitted to cross it when:
driver_test_questions.option_c: C.there is enough room to cross.
driver_test_questions.option_b: B.the train is at least 50 ft. away.

driver_test_questions.option_a: A.Yes,because there isn't a train coming
driver_test_questions.question: You are 90 feet away from a railroad crossing while on a two-way roadway. The rail crossing lights are not flashing. Are you permitted to pass a vehicle in front of you?
driver_test_questions.option_d: D.No,because you must always come to a complete stddddop at a rail crossing
driver_test_questions.option_b: B.yes,because you have enough room to pass

driver_test_questions.option_a: A.prepare to come to a complete stop
driver_test_questions.question: When nearing an intersection with a yield sign, you must:
driver_test_questions.option_c: C.travel at a slow enough speed to stop if necessary
driver_test_questions.option_b: B.look only in the direction of the yield sign

driver_test_questions.option_a: A.you may pass the vehicle only if you can see the pedestrian
driver_test_questions.question: When a vehicle in front of you stops for a pedestrian
driver_test_questions.option_d: D.you must not pass the vehicle
driver_test_questions.option_c: C.you may pass the vehicle on the right only
driver_test_questions.option_b: B.you may pass the vehicle if there is lane to do so

driver_test_questions.question: If you are turning into a street with more than one lane in your direction, which lane should you turn into?
driver_test_questions.option_d: D.the lane with the least amount of traffic

driver_test_questions.question: Signs warning that you are approaching a hazardous location are:
driver_test_questions.option_b: B.yellow with black letters or symbols

driver_test_questions.question: When it comes to signaling, when it's possible you should signal ________ braking to make a turn.

driver_test_questions.option_a: A.you may drive with caution in the indicated lane
driver_test_questions.question: A solid red X lane control signal indicates:
driver_test_questions.option_d: D.the indicated lane can only be used for turning
driver_test_questions.option_c: C.driving is permitted in the indicated lane
driver_test_questions.option_b: B.driving is not permitted in the indicated lane

driver_test_questions.question: Which of the following is not a sign of an aggressive driver?
driver_test_questions.option_d: D.driving slower than the speed limit
driver_test_questions.option_b: B.speeding up to prevent a vehicle from entering their lane

driver_test_questions.option_a: A.when preparing to make a right turn
driver_test_questions.question: When should you yield on a green light?
driver_test_questions.option_c: C.during rush hour in urban areas
driver_test_questions.option_b: B.when the green light is an arrow

driver_test_questions.question: You are approaching an intersection controlled by a stop sign, where must you stop?
driver_test_questions.option_d: D.just ahead of the stop line
driver_test_questions.option_b: B.at least 25 feet behind the stop line

driver_test_questions.question: When adjusting your seat, you should allow ______________ between the chest and steering wheel.

driver_test_questions.option_a: A.road construction is occurring on the left side of the road
driver_test_questions.question: In which of the following situations can you pass a vehicle on the right?
driver_test_questions.option_d: D.the shoulder of the road is large enough to be used as a passing lane
driver_test_questions.option_c: C.oncoming traffic is approaching on the left
driver_test_questions.option_b: B.the vehicle in front of you is making a left turn

driver_test_questions.question: Motorcycles are entitled to:

driver_test_questions.option_a: A.you must come to a complete stop and proceed with caution in the direction of the arrow
driver_test_questions.question: You are approaching a green arrow traffic signal, this indicates:
driver_test_questions.option_d: D.you may proceed in the direction of the arrow
driver_test_questions.option_c: C.you must slow down and proceed with caution in the direction of the arrow
driver_test_questions.option_b: B.you may advance through the intersection

driver_test_questions.question: If your vehicle is equipped with anti-lock brakes, when they engage it is important to:
driver_test_questions.option_c: C.take your foot off the brake
driver_test_questions.option_b: B.keep your foot on the brake

driver_test_questions.option_a: A.you may pass when it is safe to do so
driver_test_questions.question: Broken yellow lane markings indicate:
driver_test_questions.option_c: C.you may pass traffic traveling in the opposite direction
driver_test_questions.option_b: B.passing is only permitted when done so along the right

driver_test_questions.question: To stop on ice with a vehicle equipped without ABS brakes you should:
driver_test_questions.option_b: B.swerve your vehicle off the road

driver_test_questions.option_a: A.the lane closest to the centerline of the roadway
driver_test_questions.question: When initiating a U-turn you should begin it from:
driver_test_questions.option_b: B.the right edge of the road

driver_test_questions.option_a: A.are permitted to share the road with vehicles
driver_test_questions.question: Bicycles:
driver_test_questions.option_d: D.must always be giben a full lane width
driver_test_questions.option_b: B.are only permitted in designated areas

driver_test_questions.question: You are required by law to yield right-of-way to all of the following EXCEPT:
It is foggy and you see a pentagon-shaped sign approaching. You know from its shape that it indicates:

driver_test_questions.option_a: A.the lane is being used by oncoming traffic
driver_test_questions.question: On a highway being controlled by Lane Use Control Lights, you see that a lane is controlled by a flashing yellow X. What does this mean?
driver_test_questions.option_d: D.the lane may only be used for left turns
driver_test_questions.option_c: C.the lane is for high occupancy vehicles only
driver_test_questions.option_b: B.the lane is open for your use

driver_test_questions.question: Which of the following is NOT an effect of alcohol?

driver_test_questions.option_a: A.sharply steer off the edge of the road
driver_test_questions.question: If your brakes fail, what is an alternative way to stop your car?
driver_test_questions.option_d: D.turn the wheel a sharp right
driver_test_questions.option_c: C.pump your brakes or gently apply your parking brake
driver_test_questions.option_b: B.gently hit the car in front of you

driver_test_questions.option_a: A.right arm straight out the window and pointing down
driver_test_questions.question: What is the correct hand signal to indicate that you are stopping?
driver_test_questions.option_d: D.left arm straight out the window and pointing down
driver_test_questions.option_c: C.left arm straight out the windowd
driver_test_questions.option_b: B.right arm straight out the window and pointing up

driver_test_questions.question: Solid lines on the edge of the road:
driver_test_questions.option_d: D.tell you where the edge of the road is
driver_test_questions.option_c: C.are only present on multi-lane roads
driver_test_questions.option_b: B.are on either side of a no-passing zone

driver_test_questions.question: When it comes to motorcycles, they require _____ lane width to operate properly.

driver_test_questions.option_a: A.stop only if you see a hazard
driver_test_questions.question: You are approaching a green light when you see a traffic officer signalling you to stop. You should:
driver_test_questions.option_d: D.obey the traffic officer and stop
driver_test_questions.option_c: C.stop only if the officer is in your lane

driver_test_questions.question: When preparing to turn, you should especially watch out for:

driver_test_questions.option_a: A.when driving through a yellow light
driver_test_questions.question: When can you exceed the speed limit?
driver_test_questions.option_b: B.you are never permitted to exceed the speed limit

driver_test_questions.question: The most common crash in a work zone?

driver_test_questions.option_a: A.toward the nearest side of the road
driver_test_questions.question: If you are parking on a hill without a curb, you should always turn your wheels?
driver_test_questions.option_c: C.away from the nearest side of the road
driver_test_questions.option_b: B.to the left no matter which side you are on

driver_test_questions.question: When parallel parking, you should pull in to the parking spot by:

driver_test_questions.option_a: A.Drive on the shoulder of the road
driver_test_questions.question: If a driver is approaching you head on in your lane, what should you do?
driver_test_questions.option_d: D.keep your horn and pull off the road
driver_test_questions.option_c: C.Move into the left lane to avoid hitting the vehicle
driver_test_questions.option_b: B.Maintain your lane position. you have the right of way

driver_test_questions.question: When parking near a fire station, you must park at least how many feet away if you are on the same side of the road as the fire station?

driver_test_questions.option_a: A.the windows you'll need to look out of
driver_test_questions.question: When clearing snow and ice from your vehicle, you must clear it from?

driver_test_questions.option_a: A.The driver and all persons under the age of 21
driver_test_questions.question: In New York State,seat belts are required for?
driver_test_questions.option_d: D.children under the age of 16, the driver and passengers in the front seat
driver_test_questions.option_c: C.only the driver of the vehicle
driver_test_questions.option_b: B.all vehicle occupants not in a booster seat or child safety seat

driver_test_questions.option_a: A.steer to the side of the road and slow down
driver_test_questions.question: What do you do if your front wheels begin to skid on ice?
driver_test_questions.option_d: D.take your foot off the gas and shift into neutral
driver_test_questions.option_c: C.apply the emergency brake until you come to a stop
driver_test_questions.option_b: B.steer the opposite direction of the skid

driver_test_questions.question: After parking on a hill, you have to?
driver_test_questions.option_b: B.leave your right turn signal on

driver_test_questions.option_a: A.If you refuse a chemical test, you cannot be convicted
driver_test_questions.question: When it comes to impaired driving?
driver_test_questions.option_d: D.you're only dangerous to other driviers on the road
driver_test_questions.option_c: C.chemical tests cannot be used as evidence to convict you
driver_test_questions.option_b: B.you can be convicted even without a chemical test

driver_test_questions.question: Who must be secured in a child safety seat?

driver_test_questions.option_a: A.Ensure your vehicle is equipped with good tires that have deep tread
driver_test_questions.question: How can you help prevent hydroplaning in heavy rain?
driver_test_questions.option_d: D.Drive in low gears only to improve traction
driver_test_questions.option_c: C.Drive with studded tires when possible

driver_test_questions.option_a: A.Try to reach your destination as quickly as possible
driver_test_questions.question: What is one way to avoid becoming an aggressive driver?
driver_test_questions.option_d: D.Allow plenty of time to reach your destination on time
driver_test_questions.option_c: C.Drink a lot of caffeine to stay alert

driver_test_questions.option_a: A.You should move in the opposite direction of the arrow
driver_test_questions.question: When approaching a wrok zone, you see a flashing arrow in your lane pointing left. what does this mean?
driver_test_questions.option_d: D.The left lane is not in service
driver_test_questions.option_c: C.You should merge into the left lane
driver_test_questions.option_b: B.There is construction in the left lane, so drive carefully

driver_test_questions.question: How can fatigue affect your driving?

driver_test_questions.option_a: A.Stop and wait for a large gap in traffic
driver_test_questions.question: If you don't have enough room to accelerate to the express lane speed before merging, how should you proceed?
driver_test_questions.option_c: C.Merge going the fastest speed possible
driver_test_questions.option_b: B.Stop until someone lets you in

driver_test_questions.question: If you need to unload merchandise from your car,which of these signs can you stop beside?

driver_test_questions.option_a: A.driving at a speed allows you to safely stop within the distance of your headlights
driver_test_questions.question: Driving within the range of your headlights means?
driver_test_questions.option_d: D.always driving with your headlights on so other vehicles can see you
driver_test_questions.option_c: C.driving as quickly as possible while still seeing clearly
driver_test_questions.option_b: B.driving so that other vehicle are in the range of your headlights

driver_test_questions.option_a: A.Move out of that lane and slow down
driver_test_questions.question: If you are on a multi-lane road approaching a staionary emergency vehicle with flashing lights stopped on the side of the road adjacent to your lane, you must?
driver_test_questions.option_b: B.Pull over and ask if they require assistance

driver_test_questions.option_a: A.Turn the wheels to the left
driver_test_questions.question: The first step in pulling out of a parallel parking space is to?
If you are under the age of 21, what BAC(Blood Alcohol Concentration) level is permitted
driver_test_questions.option_d: D.No measurable BAC is allowed for those under 21

driver_test_questions.question: Drinking alcohol and driving at night is especially dangerous because?
driver_test_questions.option_c: C.You are more likely to encounter drivers who have been drinking
driver_test_questions.option_b: B.Alcohol affects your judgement at night more

driver_test_questions.option_a: A.move into the right hand lane
driver_test_questions.question: While driving on the freeway, you approach an area with a busy entrance ramp. what is the best course of action?
driver_test_questions.option_d: D.flash your brake light so other driver will see you
driver_test_questions.option_c: C.speed up to move through the area quickly
driver_test_questions.option_b: B.move out of the right hand lane

driver_test_questions.option_a: A.you will be issued a special license
driver_test_questions.question: If you are found gulty of an alcohol or drug-related driving violation?
driver_test_questions.option_d: D.your license will be taken immediately
driver_test_questions.option_c: C.your vehicle will be taken away

driver_test_questions.question: If a driver flashes their headlights at you, it likely means ?
driver_test_questions.option_d: D.are driving on the wrong side of the road

driver_test_questions.question: In which of the following locations are you permitted to park?
driver_test_questions.option_d: D.in the road side of a parked vehicle
driver_test_questions.option_c: C.40 feet away from a pedestrain safety zone

driver_test_questions.question: The final step after changing lanes is to?

driver_test_questions.option_a: A.can stop temporarily to load or unload passengers or merchandise
driver_test_questions.question: A "No Standing" sign means you?
driver_test_questions.option_d: D.cannot stop or park your vehicle
driver_test_questions.option_c: C.cannot load or unload your vehicle
driver_test_questions.option_b: B.can stop temporarily to load or unload passengers

driver_test_questions.question: To avoid fatigue you should
driver_test_questions.option_b: B.drive on straight roads when possible

driver_test_questions.option_a: A.you consent to always wearing your seatbelt
driver_test_questions.question: New York's Implied Consent Law Means?
driver_test_questions.option_d: D.you consent to have your license revoked if you break the law
driver_test_questions.option_c: C.you consent to a chemical test to determine the level of alcohol or drugs in your system
driver_test_questions.option_b: B.you consent to others pulling you from a wrecked vehicle if unconscious

driver_test_questions.question: In New York state, whenever the weather requires you to use your windshield wipers, you must?
driver_test_questions.option_d: D.make sure your daytime running lights are working
